articles.title: What Jakobi Meyers and the Raiders are saying about the Patriots ahead of season opener
articles.description:
Familiar faces Jakobi Meyers and Pete Carroll spoke about their returns to Foxborough.

The post What Jakobi Meyers and the Raiders are saying about the Patriots ahead of season opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jakobi Meyers returns to Foxborough for the Patriots season opener on September 10.
Meyers expressed excitement about facing his former team after signing with the Raiders.
Local fans anticipate a competitive matchup, highlighting Meyers' impact on the game.

articles.title: Dante Scarnecchia likes what he sees from Patriots rookie Will Campbell
articles.description:
"There's plenty there that we all saw and you say, 'OK, that's why he's here.’”

The post Dante Scarnecchia likes what he sees from Patriots rookie Will Campbell appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dante Scarnecchia praises Patriots rookie Will Campbell for his promising performance.
Campbell's skills were highlighted during training camp, indicating his potential impact on the team.
Boston fans can expect increased offensive strength with Campbell's development this season.

articles.title: ‘That’s their prerogative’: Mike Vrabel responds to Bill Belichick’s ban on Patriots scouts at UNC
articles.description:
"That's an individual choice and we'll cross that bridge when we start looking at players," Vrabel said.

The post ‘That’s their prerogative’: Mike Vrabel responds to Bill Belichick’s ban on Patriots scouts at UNC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel comments on Bill Belichick's ban of Patriots scouts at UNC.
Vrabel emphasizes individual choice regarding scouting decisions for player evaluation.
Boston residents may see changes in player recruitment strategies due to this ban.
